definition: "roof" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 40), occurring in 家, 定, 安 etc/see also 寶蓋|宝盖[bao3 gai4]
to extend/to state/to explain/9th earthly branch: 3-5 p.m., 7th solar month (7th August-7th September), year of the Monkey/ancient Chinese compass point: 240°
old name for Shanghai 上海[Shang4 hai3]/surname Shen

sentences.english: Accurate diagnosis and treatment planning are prerequisites to successful therapy.
sentences.chinese: 审愼的术前评估和筛选是成功治疗的关键。

sentences.english: Part three, the commencement of the civil appellate procedure.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分，上诉审程序启动论。

sentences.english: It is time for the yearly check of vehicle safety.
sentences.chinese: 到车辆安全年审的时间了。

sentences.english: How is the process designed and valided?
sentences.chinese: 生产工艺是如何设计及验审的？

sentences.english: One is to have potential auditees review final candidates.
sentences.chinese: 一是让潜在的被审单位复试候选人。

sentences.english: His certificate is on the process of yearly inspection and did not present it in time.
sentences.chinese: 他的证书有提及要每年年审但他并没去年审。

sentences.english: Hunan Changsha year the charge of careful is 450.
sentences.chinese: 湖南长沙年审的费用为450。

sentences.english: I believe your acceptance is going through the UCF authorities.
sentences.chinese: 我想你的录取情况学校正在审。

sentences.english: The procedure of criminal appeal plays an important role in the error-correction of a criminal action.
sentences.chinese: 刑事上诉审程序是刑事诉讼错误纠正机制的核心部分。

sentences.english: Hong Kong company from establish from day, need a next year to review a tax reporting annually.
sentences.chinese: 香港公司自成立日起，每年需要一次年审报税。

sentences.english: The Labour Tribunal handles claims arising from contracts of employment.
sentences.chinese: 劳资审裁处审理有关雇佣合约的申索。

sentences.english: It is not necessary to set up a website in view of the function of the Tribunal.
sentences.chinese: 基于审裁处的功能，没有需要为审裁处设立网页。

sentences.english: It is not necessary to set up a website in view of the function of the Tribunal.
sentences.chinese: 基于审裁处的功能，没有需要为审裁处设立网页。

sentences.english: First, this community after the trial to take the starting mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 本社区采取先发后审机制。

sentences.english: The division also provides counsel to the Insider Dealing Tribunal.
sentences.chinese: 此外，该科也为内幕交易审裁处提供律师。

definition: to gather up/to collect/to edit/to compile
to commit sb for trial/to bring sb for interrogation
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
to review a judicial case/to reexamine
(classical) a type of battle-ax/to kill/to slaughter
oral confession (as opposed to 筆供|笔供[bi3 gong4])/statement/deposition
joint hearing/to review jointly (i.e. with other checkers)
